description: No nurse can work more than 40 hours per week
Maximum 12 hours per day (no double shifts)
Meet minimum staffing for day shift per ward definition
Meet minimum staffing for evening shift per ward definition
Meet minimum staffing for night shift per ward definition
Nurses must have required certifications for assigned ward
Cannot work night shift immediately after evening shift
Prioritize shifts that count toward certification renewal
Try to honor nurse shift preferences
Distribute weekend shifts fairly across nurses
Distribute night shifts fairly across nurses
Respect individual max night shifts preference
Each shift should have at least one senior nurse and good skill mix
Each shift should have a designated charge nurse
ICU requires 1:2 nurse to patient ratio minimum
CCU requires 1:2 nurse to patient ratio minimum
